ca.ualberta.cs.queueunderflow.adapters

Class SingleQuestionAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseExpandableListAdapter
      • ca.ualberta.cs.queueunderflow.adapters.SingleQuestionAdapter

  • public class SingleQuestionAdapter
extends BaseExpandableListAdapter
    The Class SingleQuestionAdapter. Connects a single question(& its replies) to the QAView Handles favoriting & adding the question to the reading list Handles switching to the AddAAnswerActivity & calling the WriteReplyDialogFragment to be displayed
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    group 10
